title: The Heat
description: Lily St. Claire is a simple, if beautiful Southern girl who has no idea what she is in for when she decides to move back to her home town in Louisiana after a decade of being away. But between the two very different alpha werewolves who instantly begin fighting to claim her as their mate and the serial killer who has her in his sites, she's about to find out.(Also look for The Strip, the second book in the Big Bad Wolf series)
author: Heather Killough-Walden
